output_list.criticism: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value, aka 'tradeTrap' issue. Integer overflow in setMinBalance function allows the owner to set a minimum balance to any value, aka 'minBalanceAccess' issue.
Integer overflow in the sell function allows a potential trap where a large sell order can drain a user's assets, aka 'tradeTrap' issue.
Integer overflow in the buy function allows a potential trap where a large buy order can drain a user's assets, aka 'tradeTrap' issue.
Integer overflow in the transfer function allows a potential trap where a large transfer can cause a DoS, aka 'transferTrap' issue.
Integer overflow in setMinBalance function allows the owner to set a minimum balance to any value, aka 'minBalanceAccess' issue.
